title: Dreambound - Ethereal Game Music
description: Dreambound is a high-quality pack of 10 music tracks (6 loopable) composed for use in video games.
longDescription:
Dreambound is a game music asset pack with 11 ethereal and emotionally compelling tracks (7 looping), perfect for fantasy, JRPG, or adventure games. These songs make use of a small symphony orchestra, scaled down for a more intimate experience. This pack delivers melancholy, sparkling textures, and childlike melodies which set the mood for a beautiful story driven experience. 


Pack Preview:

https://youtu.be/76pEdlGwub0


TRACKLIST:

  1. Autumn Village (Loop) [1:34]
  2. Celestial Dance [2:34]
  3. Home (Loop) [1:41]
  4. Moonlit Path [1:58]
  5. Ocean Floor (Loop) [1:16]
  6. Thania’s Mirror (Loop) [0:59]
  7. The Northern Pass [2:08]
  8. Twisting Road (Loop) [2:24]
  9. Visions of the Past [2:31]
  10. Visions of the Past (Loop) [1:45]
  11. Visit to Town (Loop) [0:55]


Music Quality:

Dreambound was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.

Technical Details:


10 Stereo WAV music tracks (16-bit/44.1kHz)

Bit rate: 1411 kbps

184MB uncompressed

Royalty-Free license


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit andrewchamberscomposer.com
